item.title: Garden Pavilion
item.description: 榕阁 Over the weekend, I had a meal at Garden Pavilion, located at the Park Hyatt hotel. Prior to this visit, I was hesitant due to the high average cost per person mentioned on Dianping, ranging from seven to eight hundred yuan. However, since we were staying at the hotel, we decided to give it a try. In all honesty, the overall experience was underwhelming. The atmosphere was pleasant, but the dishes were quite mediocre, and the prices were steep.

item.title: Park Hyatt ShenZhen
item.description: have a nice try. Park Hyatt ShenZhen Pros Perfact location Cons Too expensive
